metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3390 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
lib/filelib.php in Moodle 2.1.x before 2.1.7 and 2.2.x before 2.2.4 does not properly restrict file access after a block has been hidden, which allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information by reading a file that is embedded in a block.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3390` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> debian tracker lists bug 682203 for this issue, but it's not covered by the upload that closed that bug report

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-1ubuntu1').
